# IDomainClass.PropertiesDescription property

Returns the reflection's PropertyInfo objects of the public properties of the domain class. The keys of the dictionary are the properties names. This method is useful to describe the content of a domain class, as a list of its properties.

```csharp
public IDictionary<string, PropertyInfo> PropertiesDescription { get; }
```
